name: Newsletter Subscriber Export
description: Gather subscribers from multiple platforms in one place. Automatically!I've switched newsletter platforms a few times in the past. This meant exporting all subscriber data and importing it into a new tool. Sounds familiar?This Notion template is a nifty automation tool to do exactly that, and more. You can filter your subscribers or collect subscribers from different sources. Maybe you have multiple email lists with different providers?
